meanings.definition: An antifungal medication used to treat fungal infections of the skin, hair, and nails.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed griseofulvin to clear up the fungal infection on my skin.
meanings.sent2: She applied griseofulvin cream to her nails to get rid of the fungus.
meanings.sent3: The fungi threw a party on my skin, but griseofulvin came and kicked them out!
meanings.sent4: Griseofulvin acted like a superhero, defeating the fungal villains on my nails.
meanings.sent5: I imagined griseofulvin as a tiny warrior fighting off the fungal invaders on my skin.
